website_summaries.verdict: This 4-pack of saline solution is an effective way to keep contacts fresh, and they come at a bargain price.
pros: This solution makes it easy to put contacts in and ensures all-day comfort while wearing them
Solution also acts as a useful way to store contacts while not in use while keeping them fresh
cons: This is an effective irrigation solution, but is not meant as much for disinfecting

customer_reviews.title: Has many added chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The product description just says "isotonic saline solution", which is what I wanted. What I got was: boric acid, sodium borate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride, polyaminopropyl biguanide (preservative), and edetate disodium (preservative). Not the plain salt and water that you used to get with Unisol 4 from Alcon Laboratories, now discontinued and unavailable from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Spector

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I ordered this product and it seemed fine but after I used it my eyes started feeling extreme burning. It was not even possible to keep the lenses in my eyes for more than 3 seconds. I kept putting the lenses back into the solution with a new case and so on because I’ve never had an issue with solution. I finally picked up a different brand and tried that and figured out this Equate brand is the problem! I will have to dump the order because I’m beyond my return period. I think it’s safer to buy the Kirkland brand or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: MindNBody

customer_reviews.title: Savings, convenience and encouragement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a problem using generic saline solution. I was happy to buy a 4 pack at such a good price, not only for the savings and convenience but as a way to encourage myself to be a bit more generous when using. I’ve never had a problem with the solution bothering my eyes, I can open the tap without touching the tip and I received precisely what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah X

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration and have to go in regularly for shots in my eye (ouch) and this saline is very soothing for my eyes and much cheaper than using regular dry eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Vandalsem

customer_reviews.title: As good as any
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as any other saline solution for your eyes I always go for the best price I can get on a product like this whatever's on sale
customer_reviews.author: SHAMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! saved me time from going into a big box store to purchase! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great for contacts
customer_reviews.text: Lots of solution for the money, I put this into smaller bottles To always have some everywhere I go, great value compared to the Big brand names, I'm guessing its the same stuff, no issue I highly recommend buying in bulk and refilling smaller applicator bottles. I'd highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a basic product
customer_reviews.text: For some reason saline solution seems to be more difficult to find locally at drug stores. Amazon to the rescue! High quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: GMakTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 bottles total.
customer_reviews.text: This is 4 total bottles. Not what it seems to describe in the title which is a 4 units of a twin pack. The same item is sold by Walmart and is 8 bottles in their listing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Beam

customer_reviews.title: It hurts my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This saline is sort of different from other brands of saline, in a bad way. It hurts and made me itch when i put my con on with this saline, even worse than putting my con on with the con solution, ends out not doing the rinse step perfectly. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Kiu

customer_reviews.title: Received open box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty gross considering it’s materials for eye solution. Shouldn’t be receiving secondhand returns for this type of thing
customer_reviews.author: Eclipse

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my contacts as well as to clean out a nose piercing when I first got it. It works as well as any other saline and is cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's saline!
customer_reviews.text: every contact user knows you have to have at least one bottle of saline on hand this is best bang for the money
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for slime
customer_reviews.text: We used this for slime so I’m not sure how it works as contact solution. It worked great for me when I used it years ago. Works great for slime!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for the 4 of them I could find. I like to always have backups so not to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Marcinkewicz

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and a good product
customer_reviews.text: Would like smaller sizes for traveling, but the large ones are great for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. First time using this brand. Works well w/ moisturizing ur contacts
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Healed my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sensitive eyes. I used these to rinse my daily contacts before use when I had damage to my corneas and my corneas healed in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Levesque

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT contact solution.
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth the wait and price. I added regular contact solution to the saline and use it as contact solution. It's cheap but stretches out my contact solution 200%
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Woodard

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s contact solution. It works to put my contacts in and cleans them well. It’s a great value
customer_reviews.author: James F. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money and it comes AutoShip. what else can I say
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Great value and same comfort as brand name
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using brand name and off brand contact solution for 15 years and have never noticed a difference. Thought I’d stock up to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Use to make Slime
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective to make DIY slime for your kids. Works like a charm to activate the slime.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like what you buy at the store. I used theses for a birthday party to make slime and we made 2 pounds and we still have some left over
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have Prose lenses. Many of the product I buy for my lenses are expensive. This is a cheap and easy long lasting solution.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Good product. But ordered wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good for irrigation. But not what i thought I ordered. Needed saline eye wash solution. Ordered in error. Decided not to return it. Will keep to use for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: ella knapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes so this is working for me
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Yarnall

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's contact lens. This price is pretty good and the package was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Slime!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for slime. This is the solution you need. It has the right ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Only Received one twin pack
customer_reviews.text: Description says you should receive two twin packs (four 12 ounce bottles); however, I only received one twin pack (two 12 ounce bottles).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: This solution is great, no complaints at all. Also, it arrived on the day early so that was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was ordering cleaning solutions but ordered saline solution ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering cleaning solutions but ordered saline solution. Will need to give away as I don't have soft contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: In the item information it clearly states "It disinfects and helps rinse soft contacts clean and clear.", however on the bottles it clearly states, NOT for disinfecting. Very deceiving. While I am pleased with Equate products and I will keep these (too much trouble to send them back), I will not purchase again. Not a happy buyer. I wanted something that was a multi-use product, but this is clearly not it.
customer_reviews.author: KarenH

customer_reviews.title: Good For Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Have kept saline solution in stock in the shop and garage for years, as emergency eye-wash. Street crew foreman spilled cement in his eye - my last bottle of saline used up to help. Doc said it undoubtedly prevented eye damage. So, have four more now - shop / garage / porch / office. Lets hope they are never used :)
customer_reviews.author: Sailorman

customer_reviews.title: Good 4 pack
customer_reviews.text: Good saline product for contact storage not for disinfecting! Sensative formula helps me as my eyes are extremely sensative. Can be found cheaper in stores but prone got it to be the same day which I needed. Overall good buy. Packaged well, and arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerBae Renee

customer_reviews.title: Flush away bad vision
customer_reviews.text: Great for flushing the eyes after having a tri eyes or like me waking up with cloudy vision it cleaned over stuff out of your eyes great seller fast shipping highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clowes

customer_reviews.title: Quick, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly , packaging was damaged but contents we're fine. Not medically advised, but have been able to use this in place of more expensive saline disinfectant combos for 15 years. No issues from doctors and contacts last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Fahle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price and has lasted me so long. I surprisingly really like the solution too!
customer_reviews.author: ♡ Jocelyn Fowler ♡

customer_reviews.title: Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: Great value My Dr said use this before putting eye drops in & they’ll last longer True!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's saline solution-what is not to like? I used it on my dog's teary eyes.
customer_reviews.author: whippetmom

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging
customer_reviews.text: This was a rip off! Talk about price gouging. I thought I was getting 8 bottles (4 2pks) otherwise I would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi C.

customer_reviews.title: Good saline
customer_reviews.text: Buying these bottles in bulk is a lot simpler than collecting the tears from my wife as she cuts onions.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Matthew Radens

product_meta.title: Equate Saline Solution for Sensitive Eyes Twin Pack, 12 fl oz, 4 count
product_meta.description: Equate Saline Solution is a sterile, isotonic, buffered solution, in which to safely store contact lenses. This contact lens solution keeps lenses moist and fresh and ready to use anytime. Your eyes will be protected from redness and irritation by using sensitive eyes saline solution. It disinfects and helps rinse soft contacts clean and clear. For rinsing and storing soft contact lenses. Contains Four 12 fl oz bottles. Quality gauranteed
feature_bullets: Equate Saline Solution is a sterile, isotonic, buffered solution, in which to safely store contact lenses. This contact lens solution keeps lenses moist and fresh and ready to use anytime. Your eyes will be protected from redness and irritation by using sensitive eyes saline solution. It disinfects and helps rinse soft contacts clean and clear.
For rinsing and storing soft contact lenses
